metadata.feature_description: Display featured posts in a responsive card layout with customizable appearance

steps.expected: Featured posts section should be visible at the top of the page with featured post cards
steps.actual: Featured module container exists (.publisher-featured) but is empty with 0 cards. No posts are marked as Featured in the system.

steps.expected: Featured module should contain .publisher-top-bar and .card-container with .publishcard elements
steps.actual: Module exists but .card-container is empty. The module is visible but has no content because PostManager.GetFeaturedPosts() returns empty collection.

issues: No posts are currently marked as Featured in the test environment
Featured Posts module exists on the page but displays nothing when no featured posts are available

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Featured checkbox UI in post editor

steps.expected: Edit Post Details panel should display with Featured checkbox option
steps.actual: Edit Post Details panel displays correctly with Featured checkbox, Title, Description, URL, and Tags fields

steps.action: Verify Featured checkbox is present and functional
steps.expected: Featured checkbox should be visible and clickable
steps.actual: Featured checkbox is present in the edit panel and can be toggled via JavaScript/Knockout binding

steps.action: Check the Featured checkbox on a post and click Save
steps.expected: Post should be saved with Featured=true and appear in Featured Posts section
steps.actual: Featured checkbox was checked via Knockout observable (model.featured(true)) and save() method was called, but changes did not persist after page navigation

steps.action: Return to News page and verify Featured post appears
steps.expected: Featured Posts section should now display the marked post
steps.actual: Featured Posts section remains empty. The save operation appeared to fail silently without error messages.

issues: Save operation for Featured checkbox does not persist changes
No error message or feedback when save fails
Multiple overlay elements (personaBar-iframe, edit-bar, file uploader) intercept click events making direct UI interaction difficult

steps.action: Verify desktop and mobile card layouts in Featured module
steps.expected: Desktop cards should show at full width, mobile cards should be hidden; at 640px breakpoint cards should switch to mobile view
steps.actual: Could not test responsive layout because Featured module has no content to display. CSS code confirms desktop-card shown by default and mobile-card shown at max-width 640px.

issues: Cannot test responsive behavior without Featured posts to display

steps.action: Examine Featured post card for required information
steps.expected: Cards should display: title, author, published date, summary, and optional comment count
steps.actual: Cannot verify card information because no Featured posts are available. Code review confirms cards should show: PostedOn date, AuthorDisplayName, Title, Summary, and Disqus comment count if configured.

issues: Cannot verify card content without Featured posts

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test card hover effects and navigation

steps.action: Hover over Featured post card and click to navigate
steps.expected: Card should have hover effects and clicking should navigate to post detail page
steps.actual: Cannot test hover effects or navigation because no Featured post cards are present. Code review confirms desktop cards have onclick handler for navigation and mobile cards use touch events.

issues: Cannot test interaction without Featured posts

observations: The Featured Posts module (Featured.ascx) is correctly placed on the Publisher/News page and initializes properly
The module uses PostManager.Instance.GetFeaturedPosts() to retrieve posts where Featured=true
Default maximum featured posts is 2 (Publisher_MaxNumberOfFeaturedPosts portal setting)
FeaturedCardManager.js handles mobile touch events and click navigation to post details
The Featured checkbox exists in the post edit UI and uses Knockout data binding (model.featured observable)
CSS confirms responsive design: desktop cards (45% width, 360px height) and mobile cards (shown at max-width 640px)
Multiple UI overlays (personaBar-iframe, edit-bar, file uploader input) intercept mouse events, making UI testing challenging
The save operation via Knockout's save() method did not persist Featured checkbox changes
Disqus integration for comment counts is conditionally shown based on DisqusManager.HasBeenConfigured
